uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
Class MDPStrategy

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.AbstractStrategy
      uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
          uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.AdaptiveStrategyImpl
              uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.DiscreteLearnerStrategy
                  uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.MDPStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, AdaptiveStrategy, FixedQuantityStrategy, Strategy, AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable
public class MDPStrategy
extends DiscreteLearnerStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable

A trading strategy that uses an MDP learning algorithm, such as the Q-learning algorithm, to adapt its trading behaviour in successive auction rounds. The current market-quote is hashed to produce an integer state value.

Version:
$Revision$

Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
